reason: NO_RULE - insufficient evidence or no valid constraint found
notes: The provided evidence does not establish a clear semantic constraint between the two fields from different IEs. It only describes the behavior of the firstActiveDownlinkBWP-Id field, without any explicit relation to the bwp-id field in the tci-statestoaddmodlist.

meta.evidence: If configured for an SCell, this field contains the ID of the downlink bandwidth part to be used upon activation of an SCell. The initial bandwidth part is referred to by BWP-Id = 0. \\ Upon reconfiguration with reconfigurationWithSync, the network sets the firstActiveDownlinkBWP-Id and firstActiveUplinkBWP-Id to the same value.

full_api_response.notes: The provided evidence does not establish a clear semantic constraint between the two fields from different IEs. It only describes the behavior of the firstActiveDownlinkBWP-Id field, without any explicit relation to the bwp-id field in the tci-statestoaddmodlist.
